ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Akmon, Hammer of Purphoros
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This warhammer is a divine weapon dedicated to the god Purphoros.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Axe of the Dwarvish Lords
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This magical axe is a symbol of dwarven royalty and power.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Baba Yaga's Mortar and Pestle
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This magical mortar and pestle are associated with the legendary witch Baba Yaga.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Blade of Broken Mirrors
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This sword is crafted from shattered mirrors and has unique reflective properties.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Book of Exalted Deeds
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This holy book embodies principles of goodness and virtue.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Book of Vile Darkness
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This cursed book is a source of dark knowledge and power.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Book of Vile Darkness (Variant)
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This variant of the Book of Vile Darkness possesses unique properties.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Crook of Rao
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This magical staff is associated with the god Rao and promotes law and order.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Dekella, Bident of Thassa
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This trident is dedicated to the sea god Thassa and has control over water.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Demonomicon of Iggwilv
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This forbidden tome is a source of demonic lore and power.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Ephixis, Bow of Nyela
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This bow is associated with the goddess Nyela and is a symbol of hunting prowess.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Eye and Hand of Vecna
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: These artifacts are the remnants of the lich Vecna and grant dark powers.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Grovelthrash
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This sentient greataxe is a brutal weapon with a cruel personality.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Iggwilv's Cauldron
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This magical cauldron is associated with the archmage Iggwilv and has various alchemical properties.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Khrusor, Spear of Heliod
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This spear is dedicated to the sun god Heliod and radiates holy power.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Lash of Shadows
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This whip is made of shadowstuff and can drain the life force of its victims.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Luba's Tarokka of Souls
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This tarokka deck has the power to manipulate souls and fate.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Mace of the Black Crown
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This mace is associated with dark rulers and can dominate the will of others.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Mastix, Whip of Erebos
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This whip is dedicated to the god Erebos and has the power to instill fear.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Mighty Servant of Leuk-o
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This magical servant can perform various tasks and commands.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Orb of Dragonkind
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This orb can control dragons and is associated with dragonkind.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Orrery Of The Wanderer
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This orrery has the power to predict celestial events and their effects.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Ring of Winter
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This ring has control over ice and cold and is associated with a legendary archfey.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Ruin's Wake
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This weapon is destructive and can lay waste to its surroundings.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Ruinstone
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This stone is a fragment of a powerful artifact and has latent magical properties.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Silken Spite
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This whip is made of shadow silk and has the power to ensnare and bind its targets.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Staff of the Forgotten One
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This staff is associated with a forgotten deity and has mysterious powers.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Stone of Golorr
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This stone is a sentient artifact with knowledge of secrets and hidden places.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Sword of Kas
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This sword was once wielded by a powerful assassin and harbors dark energies.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Sword of Zariel
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This sword is associated with the archduchess Zariel and is a symbol of her power.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Teeth of Dahlver-Nar
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: These teeth are relics of a legendary sea monster and have aquatic powers.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: The Bloody End
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This axe is stained with the blood of countless foes and thirsts for more.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: The Infernal Machine Of Lum The Mad
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This infernal machine has bizarre and unpredictable effects.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Wand of Orcus
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This wand is associated with the demon lord Orcus and can control undead.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Will of the Talon
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This greatsword is associated with the talon, a symbol of dark power.

ArtifactsMagicItems.Name: Wyrmskull Throne
ArtifactsMagicItems.Description: This throne is made from the skull of a dragon and has commanding presence.
